+
+## isValidASCII {#isvalidascii}
+
+Checks whether a string contains only valid ASCII characters.
+
+Alias: `isASCII`.
+
+**Syntax**
+
+```sql
+isValidASCII(input)
+```
+
+**Arguments**
+

discussion_comments.comment_body: You can embed documentation into code (example https://github.com/ClickHouse/ClickHouse/blob/1516ebdc92592b2c31b65790f04a420240b56e03/src/Functions/ascii.cpp#L75-L90). Then you may not add it into `docs/`

commented_code:
└──────┴────────────────────────┴──────────────┴────────────────────┴─────────┴──────────────────┴────────────────┘
 ```
 
+If an array contains values of different types and setting `input_format_json_infer_array_of_dynamic_from_array_of_different_types` is enabled (it is enabled by default), then it will have type `Array(Dynamic)`:
+```sql
+SET input_format_json_infer_array_of_dynamic_from_array_of_different_types=1;
+DESC format(JSONEachRow, '{"arr" : [42, "hello", [1, 2, 3]]}');
+```
+
+```

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -390,6 +390,18 @@ DESC format(JSONEachRow, '{"arr" : [null, 42, null]}')
 └──────┴────────────────────────┴──────────────┴────────────────────┴─────────┴──────────────────┴────────────────┘
 ```
 
+If an array contains values of different types and setting `input_format_json_infer_array_of_dynamic_from_array_of_different_types` is enabled (it is enabled by default), then it will have type `Array(Dynamic)`:
+```sql
+SET input_format_json_infer_array_of_dynamic_from_array_of_different_types=1;
+DESC format(JSONEachRow, '{"arr" : [42, "hello", [1, 2, 3]]}');
+```
+
+```
discussion_comments.comment_body:
The linter is complaining because we're not setting any language for this code block: https://s3.amazonaws.com/clickhouse-test-reports/json.html?PR=80859&sha=19da2a4380c468bc24cc48688ec228702cce90a7&name_0=PR&name_1=Docs+check

>docs/interfaces/schema-inference.md:399 MD040/fenced-code-language Fenced code blocks should have a language specified [Context: "```"]

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -390,6 +390,18 @@ DESC format(JSONEachRow, '{"arr" : [null, 42, null]}')
 └──────┴────────────────────────┴──────────────┴────────────────────┴─────────┴──────────────────┴────────────────┘
 ```
 
+If an array contains values of different types and setting `input_format_json_infer_array_of_dynamic_from_array_of_different_types` is enabled (it is enabled by default), then it will have type `Array(Dynamic)`:
+```sql
+SET input_format_json_infer_array_of_dynamic_from_array_of_different_types=1;
+DESC format(JSONEachRow, '{"arr" : [42, "hello", [1, 2, 3]]}');
+```
+
+```

discussion_comments.comment_body: `nit:` Maybe worth adding a note or a badge about `system.latency_log` probably under `system.histogram_metrics` doc or somewhere suitable. Something along the lines `system.latency_log` was deprecated after version `25.x`, instead ``system.histogram_metrics` should be used or something similar.
